name: SMRTDTA_ELEM_BEREAVE
description: This table is a bridge between bereavement contact context SmartData element values and the source bereavement records.

columns.name: HLV_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the value record.

columns.name: BEREAVEMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the linked bereavement record that is associated with the SmartData element value.

columns.name: ELEMENT_ID
columns.description: The SmartData identifier (SDI) for this row.
